update(float) - Method in class com.cmt3319.game.MainMenuScreen
Updates cloud manager CloudManager.update(float), which moves clouds across screen, updates player Player.update(float), which also moves player across screen, checks if player is still visible, and if it isn't, it sets player back to start position.
update(float) - Method in class com.cmt3319.game.MovingObject
Updates position of object based on gravity and jumpforce.MovingObject.checkGravity() is called first.
